name: Donkey Kong Land
synopsis: Donkey Kong teams up with his sidekick, Diddy Kong, on a new adventure in this platformer inspired by the classic Donkey Kong Countryâ„¢. Face flying pigs, deadly Zingers and reptilian Kremlings, as you journey through a mysterious pirate ship, perilous snow, an unbelievable underwater temple and crazy capers in the sky. Fun fact: the original Game Boy version was released with a special banana-yellow Game Pak!
